title: Event Ticket Scraper - Input
description: Search events, concerts, sports games, and shows via the Ticketmaster Discovery API. Get event details, ticket prices, venue info, presale dates, and direct ticket links. Requires a free Ticketmaster API key.

apiKey.sectionDescription: Your Ticketmaster Discovery API key. Get one for free at https://developer.ticketmaster.com/
apiKey.title: Ticketmaster API Key
apiKey.description: Your Ticketmaster Discovery API key. Register for free at developer.ticketmaster.com to get one.

mode.sectionDescription: Choose how to find events. 'search' finds events by keyword and filters. 'get_event' looks up a specific event by Ticketmaster ID. 'venues' searches for venues.
mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Operation mode: 'search' for keyword/filter search, 'get_event' for lookup by event ID, 'venues' for venue search.

keyword.sectionDescription: Provide search terms and location filters to find events.
keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Search term -- artist name, event name, team, or genre (e.g. 'Taylor Swift', 'NBA', 'comedy').

city.sectionDescription: Narrow results by location. You can use city, state, country, postal code, or geographic coordinates.
city.title: City
city.description: Filter by city name (e.g. 'New York', 'Los Angeles').

stateCode.title: State/Province Code
stateCode.description: Filter by state or province code (e.g. 'NY', 'CA', 'ON').

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Filter by ISO Alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'US', 'CA', 'GB').

latlong.title: Latitude,Longitude
latlong.description: Geographic center point as 'lat,long' (e.g. '40.7128,-74.0060'). Use with radius.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Search radius from latlong or postal code center point, in miles (default) or km.

classificationName.sectionDescription: Narrow results by event type, date range, and other criteria.
classificationName.title: Classification
classificationName.description: Filter by event type/genre. Examples: 'Music', 'Sports', 'Arts & Theatre', 'Film', 'Comedy', 'Rock', 'Pop', 'Hip-Hop/Rap', 'NBA', 'NFL', 'MLB'.

startDateTime.title: Start Date
startDateTime.description: Filter events starting on or after this date/time. ISO 8601 format with timezone: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ' (e.g. '2025-06-01T00:00:00Z').

endDateTime.title: End Date
endDateTime.description: Filter events starting on or before this date/time. ISO 8601 format with timezone: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ' (e.g. '2025-12-31T23:59:59Z').

sort.title: Sort By
sort.description: Sort results by the given field and order.

maxResults.sectionDescription: Control how many results are returned.
maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of events to return (1-1000). Free users are limited to 25 per run. Note: Ticketmaster API limits deep paging to ~1000 results per search.

requestIntervalSecs.sectionDescription: Control rate limiting for the Ticketmaster API.
requestIntervalSecs.title: Request Interval (seconds)
requestIntervalSecs.description: Minimum seconds between API requests. Ticketmaster allows 5 requests/second. Default is conservative to avoid hitting rate limits.
